school.title: 🏫 At School
school.description: Practice conversations you might have at school with teachers and classmates
school.context: You are at school. You will have conversations with teachers, classmates, and other school staff about school activities, subjects, and daily routines.

store.title: 🛒 At the Store
store.description: Learn to shop and talk to store workers when buying things
store.context: You are at a store with your family. You will practice talking to store workers, asking for items, and learning about shopping.

home.title: 👨‍👩‍👧 At Home
home.description: Practice family conversations and talking about home activities
home.context: You are at home with your family. You will have conversations about daily activities, helping at home, and family time.
